uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.jdbc.expr

Class FuncExpression<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.jdbc.expr.FuncExpression<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    SQLExpression<T>, SQLValue<T>, Targetted<T>

    public class FuncExpression<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements SQLExpression<T>
    A SQLExpression that applies a SQLFunc to and inner SQLExpression. if the inner expression is null a constant value 1 is used.
    Author:
    spb
